title: Application Management Engineer Intern
description: Applying for a position in the IT field for the first time, I saw what teamwork really means and how work is distributed in a large company. For 1 month I participated in trainings based not only on the DevOps side, but also on the Development side, in the end putting in aplication this knowledge on a large project

title: Training Participant (React - Bytex)
description: The desire to learn more frontend concepts on my own captured me, enrolling in this course being the best idea ever.

title: Java Software Engineer Academy
description: I attended this academy hoping to deepen my knowledge of java and web services.

title: Java Software Engineer Intern
description: I was offered an opportunity to enroll in an internship on Java, accepting it with great pleasure to deepen my knowledge even more.

title: Software Engineer Intern
description: I loved React so I wanted to continue with it. This opportunity was perfect to learn more advanced React concepts and to make me feel more confortable with it.
